Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <SmeLLyArMpiTs> @Ginasis Mining Pools  how about Immature ?  whats that.. thanks!

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <0x03> blocks that are freshly mined or staked will have to mature for 100 blocks before you can do anything with them

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <SmeLLyArMpiTs> so if i am  Immature: 0.03872614 .  it means i need to wait till it is 100 before i can use my coin?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <0x03> not necessarily

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <0x03> we don't know of how many blocks this immature balance is

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <0x03> but i think it's probably from one block

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Oink> It means you have 0,038bla VRSC in immature stakes.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Oink> As soon as those stakes are mature, they’ll show up as balance

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Oink> Once the balance >= 1, it’ll be paid to your R-address

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <0x03> thats a pool specific detail ^

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <0x03> for ginasis it's 1 indeed

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrdvrsc] <Godballz> @SmeLLyArMpiTs
This mining guide will go over pretty much everything but you'll have to scroll half way down to the pool mining section- <https://medium.com/veruscoin/how-to-start-cpu-mining-verus-coin-vrsc-from-your-laptop-in-under-5-minutes-f69c9aae340e>
.
 And here is a YouTube video that explains how to set up a .bat file inside a miner's folder (obviously you'll have to substitute some stuff with the Verus guide on GinasisMining etc.) But sometimes it helps me to have a visual-
<https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=WIh0tHxMcOU>
.
Here is a site that gives a zcash mining guide but it goes over basics with things such as difficulty and other things but the first link, John's guide will be the most useful for what you're doing- <https://99bitcoins.com/zcash-mining-guide-beginners-pc/>
I'll look for a better one in the mean time but it wouldn't hurt to go over some basics if you are just jumping into things. Lord knows I had to just like, I'm sure, so many of us.

Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Oink> Solo min8ng is like: you stake a block or you don’t. There’s no buildup in funds. All or nothing

Content: [dscrdvrsc] <SmeLLyArMpiTs> i think i am starting to understand .. based on my understanding.. my  Immature: 0.05107928 .  will only go up when the next block is found and my shares counted .. right?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <SmeLLyArMpiTs> and once the 100 block passes for the respective blocks,  it will go into balance!

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <0x03> In solo mining, theres no share crediting. you only earn when you find a block.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <0x03> the 'wasted' shares aren't credited.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <0x03> when you (hypothetically) quit mining 1sec before you hit a block, that would be very unlucky, but ...thats how it works.
